ResearchProjectDef.label: Augmentation Serum Basic Tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Begin research on creating controlled augmentation serums. Using the genetic material of the local wildlife, mechanite bio-reconstruction, and engineered biochemicals, we could make serums that change the biology of the injected subject, making them faster, stronger, or even into something else entirely.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: You've learned how to create special serums, useable in augmenting living organisms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Experimental Augmentation Serum Tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the Foundational Basis of the Augmentation serums complete, we can begin practical testing. And what better candidate to use like the mysterious thrumbo?
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Your Understanding of the basis of the Augmentation serum has expanded, allowing you to make more experimental serums. Do be warned though... Some of them are unstable.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Paragon Augmentation Serum Tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: After a Lifetime's worth of research and development, the augmentation serum has been finally improved, allowing for more "Stable" augmentations, even when using more exotic materials.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: We've learned how to create Paragon-Class serums, which are stronger than the average serum, but much more stable compared to the Experimental variants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Apex Augmentation Serum Tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: After a Lifetime's worth of research and development, the augmentation serum has been finally improved, allowing for more "Stable" augmentations, even when using more exotic materials.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: We've learned how to create Apex-Class serums.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Aberrant's Research Theorem: Section 1
ResearchProjectDef.description: "This Theorem of mine, i dedicate to those brave enough to traverse the Unknown, and seek to follow my footsteps. Though you may be lost as i once were, let my trail be your guide into the strange and the anomalous." - Written by Researcher "A".
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: "Before stepping into the unknowable to understand that which is unknown, the research and preparation begins." -"A"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Aberrant's Research Theorem: Section 2
ResearchProjectDef.description: "This Part of my Theorem shall refer to things within these strange lands i still scarcely understand, such as the Magnificent Adaptations of the Primals or the Extreme changes of the Aberrants and hopefully, whoever is reading this can glean insights from what i may have missed, and hopefully they can verify the results and information even if my time has passed. After all, not even cryptosleep can spare you from time." -"A"
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: "And with preparations as ready as we can be, From here on out the dive into the Unknown truly begins." -"A"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Aberrant's Research Theorem: Section 3
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: "The fundamental laws of the universe as we know it are ignored by these phenomena, and thus we must adapt as humanity has done for ages past." -"A"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Aberrant's Research Theorem: Section 4
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: "To grasp at the stars in the night sky, no matter how distant they may be is something our ancestors have done long before we even knew what iron was. In a sense, the path we are treading is not much different." -"A".

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project: Pioneer's Standard
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the Emergence of these new unstable zones, new equipment had to be produced in response, each requiring siuationally adaptable mechanisms yet also having the capability of being maintainable even in Extreme conditions far away from resupply points.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: We have now discovered how to create equipment that can fullfill the parameters that require ease of maintenance and adaptability in most situations with the application of advanced engineering technologies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project: Calcified Evergreen Leshen
ResearchProjectDef.description: Within the Anomalous Zones, a few Pioneers discovered a species of symbiotic plant capable of growing around a nearby object, then calcifying its bark and moving using its softer insides resulting in a "living creature" with a ghastly, root bound appearance. This Project aims to use augment serums to modify those seeds to our benefit.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Using the technology for the Augserums, we have discovered how to edit and manipulate the Pale "Leshen" seeds we have gathered to our uses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project: The Unyielding Corpus
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using the Mechanites for more than simple bodily reconstruction, we could reprogram more of them per dose to create a serum that enhances regeneration akin to Luciferium. Only this time the subject would most likely die of starvation due to increased cellular activity instead of cellular degradation.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Using the technology for the Augserums, we have discovered ways to increase regenerative capabilities of living organisms, albeit at the cost of increased metabolic activity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project: Ferra Animus
ResearchProjectDef.description: An experimental project which aims to simulate the capabilities of Aberrant Entities Using technology.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Using the technology for the Augserums, we have discovered ways to increase regenerative capabilities of living organisms, albeit at the cost of increased metabolic activity.
